original_title: UFC 30: The Battle On The Boardwalk
overview: UFC 30: Battle on the Boardwalk was a mixed martial arts event held by the Ultimate Fighting Championship at the Trump Taj Mahal in Atlantic City, New Jersey on February 23, 2001. UFC 30 was also the first UFC event since UFC 22 to see a home video release.
title: UFC 30: The Battle On The Boardwalk
